data.title: Riviera Radio In English
data.meta_description: Listen live to get the latest French Riviera news, French news, sport, business, weather and much more.
data.text:
Giveaways

Throughout summer, we are giving away many great prizes such as tickets for the circus, tickets for the most famous music festivals on the Riviera etc... Just register to our Privilege Club to have a chance to win and by being a member, you can win many other great prizes.

Advertise on riviera radio

Riviera Radio has produced new business for almost every type of business in the South of France or serving the area. Our advertisers range from new startup businesses up to multi national organisations, all have benefited from the power of radio to put across their message. Contact sales@rivieraradio.mc for more information.
